string.value: If I need #b#t4031478##k, I should go see #b#p2050013##k in #b#p2050013##k in#m221000000#.

#p2012017# said he left #b#t4031478##k with #b#p2050013##k and told me to get it from him. But #p2050013# says that he doesn't remember anything about #t4031478# but he might if I bring him #b#t4001084##k. ...He's cunning, I certianly wouldn't guessed that by looking at him.\n\n#i4001084##t4001084# #b#c4001084# / 1#k
I gave him #t4001084# and received #t4031478#. At last!
...휴즈에게 주기로 한 오래가는 건전지요? 어. 글쎄요. 휴즈에게 언제 건전지를 주기로 했는지 기억이 잘 안 나는데... 요새 파풀라투스 때문에 정신이 없거든요. 그거 움직이는 원리 때문에 워낙 바빠서요. 어쩌면 파풀라투스의 증표를 가져다 주시면, 오래가는 건전지가 떠오를지도 몰라요.
#b파풀라투스의 증표#k를 가져다주시겠다고요? 오오. 굉장히 친절한 분이시로군요. 그럼 기다리겠습니다.
파풀라투스의 증표... 오래가는 건전지요? 그게 뭐더라...
Hi! What are you looking for?

... durable batteries that were supposed to given to Hugh? Well.. I can't remember when I told him that... I'm so busy with working on the principle of Papulatus's movement. If you can get me the Seal of Papulatus, I should be able to spare some effort on making durable batteries. What do you say?
Return to me with the #bSeal of Papulatus#k! I'll wait right here!
Seal of Papulatus....durable battery? What's that?...
Oh... That's the Seal of Papulatus.Thank you. ...Yeah? durable battery? Ah, yes! I built one for you while you were off getting the Seal. Here you go!
How's Hugh? Tell him to cheer up!
Hmm... The principle of Papultus' machine consumes me--how could it work? I can't think of anything else, much less how to build a durable battery.
